steal_random_item.name: Robber's gloves (player's item)
steal_random_item.desc: Steal a random item to the mentioned player, if none to a random player

steal_random_money.name: Robber's gloves (money)
steal_random_money.desc: Steal a random amount of money to the mentioned player, if none to a random player

reroll_float.name: Reroll Artefact
reroll_float.desc: Reroll the float of a random item in your inventory

swap_money.name: Swap spell
swap_money.desc: Swap your balance with that of a random player

random_item.name: Mystery Box
random_item.desc: Give you a random item, ignoring the classic probabilities

free_market_offer.name: Robber's gloves (market)
free_market_offer.desc: Steal a random offer from the market

-0.075.name: -0.075 Orb
-0.075.desc: Remove 0.075 to the float of a random item in your inventory

-0.025.name: -0.025 Orb
-0.025.desc: Remove 0.025 to the float of a random item in your inventory

-25%.name: -25% parchment
-25%.desc: Remove 25% to the float of a random item in your inventory

-10%.name: -10% parchment
-10%.desc: Remove 10% to the float of a random item in your inventory
